summary: This is a mod that turns most iron weapons into black iron!
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that re-textures iron into black iron! Please look at the screenshots!

===INSTALL===
Just place the texture folder into your Steam>Steamapps>Common>Skyrim>Data folder and merge and replace everything! 

===INPORTANT===
If you also want black steel! Download my Black Steel - Weapons mod here!

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3388
author: kclimer13
